meanings.definition: The quality or state of being boneheaded.
meanings.sent1: His boneheadednesses were evident in his inability to follow simple instructions.
meanings.sent2: Her constant boneheadednesses made it difficult for her to keep a job.
meanings.sent3: Despite his boneheadednesses, he always managed to make us laugh with his silly mistakes.
meanings.sent4: The team's boneheadednesses on the field cost them the championship.
meanings.sent5: The boneheadednesses of the villain made him a memorable character in the story.

meanings.definition: The actions or behaviors characteristic of someone who is boneheaded.
meanings.sent1: The boneheadednesses of the driver caused a major traffic jam.
meanings.sent2: She couldn't stand his constant boneheadednesses in the workplace.
meanings.sent3: His boneheadednesses in trying to fix the sink only made the leak worse.
meanings.sent4: The politician's boneheadednesses in the debate cost him the election.
meanings.sent5: The team's boneheadednesses on the court led to their defeat in the final game.
